profile.name: Elevated Urban Casual, Thoughtfully Layered
colors: Refined neutrals (charcoal, navy, camel, olive, off-white)
Enriched with deep jewel tones (burgundy, forest green) or sophisticated earthy accents (burnt orange, rust)
profile.fit: Relaxed but tailored; comfortable silhouettes with intentional structure. Well-fitting outerwear, straight-leg or tapered trousers, sweaters with clean lines. Avoid excessive bagginess, focus on modern drape.
profile.textures: High-quality natural fibers: merino wool, cashmere blends, structured cotton twill, refined corduroy, brushed flannel. Subtle patterns like houndstooth, fine checks, or textured knits. Elevated technical fabrics for weather-appropriate outerwear.
profile.layering: Purposeful and visually dynamic. Base layers of quality tees/henleys, mid-layers of fine-gauge knit sweaters or collared shirts, topped with structured overcoats (wool, peacoat) or smart casual jackets (chore, bomber). Focus on varying fabric weights and lengths for depth.
accessories: Curated and refined leather or technical fabric backpacks
Statement scarves in sophisticated patterns or solid rich colors
Well-maintained leather boots or clean, minimalist sneakers
